messages.title: THE PAST / THE FUTURE
messages.content: Both Tories and Labour have failed the country - 'British politics is falling apart -- the Tories are to blame, but Labour is also a shambles.'; Jo Swinson is the Prime Minister we deserve.

messages.title: The Liberal Democrats are WINNING across the country...
messages.content: 'The Lib Dem fightback is real - and it's changing everything.'; 'Lib Dems winning and on the up after by-election victory.'

mentions.tacticalSituation: Lib Dems winning and on the up after by-election victory.

issues.governance: British politics is falling apart -- the Tories are to blame, but Labour is also a shambles.

quotes.text: The Lib Dem fightback is real - and it's changing everything.

images.caption: Jo Swinson is the Prime Minister we deserve.

leaflet.additionalNotes: This leaflet contains references to quotes from SKY NEWS and THE GUARDIAN but does not provide specific policies or detailed stances on issues.
